fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Flip a coin on another player, either getting heads or tails. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Heads: The next night, the player may use the same ability twice or two different abilities.
- Tails: The player is removed from the game at the end of the night. Previous actions stay and the player can still win depending on their win con.
- You may not flip a coin on a player twice in one game.
- **Ethereal:** Your defense only applies to Evil or Neutral roles. Attacks from Good roles bypass your defense unless youâ€™re given defense through other means.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Good Faction lose.
